Name: Venture Arms Starcrossed
Description:
Item Type: Light Armor 
Damage Reduction: 20%
Temp. Rating: -38 / 68 °C

Robert Space Industries’ Venture Explorer Suit provides exceptional protection against the dangers of space. Designed for those who don't know where their next adventure might go, the suit combines comfort and safety without sacrificing mobility. This special Starcrossed edition is modeled after the armor worn by Yuri Ilyin in the famous 25th century vid, Coramor, which inspired the eponymous lovers' festival.
